src:
Quando a galera para pra ver o plantão policial na TV
05 Nov 2019, 20:31 by Joe



Legal que ele tá com a mesma roupa ainda…
Ele saiu da cadeia e veio correndo pro bar ver a própria prisão junto com seus amigos.
O Brasil faz parte de outra dimensão do mundo, tipo uma ilha de LOST.
text:
When the guys stop to see the police duty on TV
05 Nov 2019, 20:31 by Joe



It's cool that he's in the same outfit yet…
He got out of jail and came running to the bar to see his own prison with his friends.
Brazil is part of another dimension of the world, like an island of LOST.
